Hi! We have a module which basically gets its content via a HubDB table. It appears that every time we perform a new deploy, we have to go to Design Tools and manually select the table again because the setting is reset for some reason. Any clues why this might be happening?
What I meant to say is oh crap you can use the default filter and make sure that it's always going to by default use the table you wanted to use
